monogr.title: The Old Syriac Gospels or Evangelion da-Mepharreshê, Being the Text of the Sinai or Syro-Antiochene Palimpsest, Including the Latest Additions and Emendations, with the Variants of the Curetonian Text, Corroborations from Many Other MSS., and a List of Quotations from Ancient Authors

body.bibl: Lewis, Agnes Smith. The Old Syriac Gospels or Evangelion Da-Mepharreshê, Being the Text of the Sinai or Syro-Antiochene Palimpsest, Including the Latest Additions and Emendations, with the Variants of the Curetonian Text, Corroborations from Many Other MSS., and a List of Quotations from Ancient Authors. London: Williams and Norgate, 1910.

Agnes Smith Lewis, The Old Syriac Gospels or Evangelion Da-Mepharreshê, Being the Text of the Sinai or Syro-Antiochene Palimpsest, Including the Latest Additions and Emendations, with the Variants of the Curetonian Text, Corroborations from Many Other MSS., and a List of Quotations from Ancient Authors (London: Williams and Norgate, 1910).
